item.title: Advice For Joining a Startup
item.description: Advice for joining a startup I’ve recently been asked this a few times and thought I’d write down my thoughts. Famously Sam Altman said one of the best things you can do as an ambitious 19-year-old is join a startup on “breakaway trajectory”. I personally had my own start-up, before I then joined a startup at 20, worked there for 3 years, and now at 24 doing my own start-up again.
